item.title: CVE-2024-27963|2024-03-21T16:45:22.852Z -- crisp -- crisp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Crisp allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Crisp: from n/a through 0.44.
